\\\\n )}\\\\n
\\\\n {\\\\n setShowTimelineSetting(false);\\\\n setUpdatedProposalStatus(proposalStatus);\\\\n },\\\\n }}\\\\n />\\\\n {\\\\n if (snapshot.supervisor !== supervisor) {\\\\n editProposal({\\\\n timeline: updatedProposalStatus.value,\\\\n });\\\\n } else if (\\\\n updatedProposalStatus.value.status ===\\\\n TIMELINE_STATUS.FUNDED\\\\n ) {\\\\n editProposalStatus({\\\\n timeline: {\\\\n ...updatedProposalStatus.value,\\\\n payouts: !paymentHashes[0]\\\\n ? []\\\\n : paymentHashes.filter(\\\\n (item) => item !== \\\\\\\"\\\\\\\"\\\\n ),\\\\n },\\\\n });\\\\n } else {\\\\n editProposalStatus({\\\\n timeline: updatedProposalStatus.value,\\\\n });\\\\n }\\\\n setShowTimelineSetting(false);\\\\n },\\\\n }}\\\\n />\\\\n
\\\\n
\\\\n )}\\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n \\\\n);\\\\n"}}}}}

{"body": {"name": "Travel Reimbursement [REDACTED] IRL Bangkok 2024", "summary": "My name is Lorenzo Castagnone, a blockchain enthusiast and Web3 developer with over 4 years of experience. I have actively contributed to the NEAR ecosystem and recently won the Nearcon 23 pitching competition with our project, DeFi Builder. I am requesting travel reimbursement to attend the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok, where I will continue building innovative solutions for the NEAR ecosystem.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "\\\\n\\\\n**NEAR Contributions & Achievements**  \\\\n- Winner of the pitching competition at Nearcon 23 with DeFi Builder, an AI-based tool for generating smart contract code on NEAR. [Project link](https://devpost.com/software/defi-builder).  \\\\n- Participated in multiple high-profile hackathons, winning several prizes.  \\\\n\\\\n**Hackathon Experience**  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: Nearcon 23 Pitch Competition\\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: MultiversX xDay 2023  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: Neo X Grind Hackathon  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: BNB Chain Q3 Hackathon  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: ICP Balkans Ideathon  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f948} 2nd Prize: Starknet Hackathon  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: Fuel House  \\\\n- \\\\u{1f3c6} 1st Prize: Areon Network Hackathon  \\\\n\\\\n**Hackathon Project Plan**  \\\\nFor [REDACTED], I will focus on advancing Near Yield, a platform that utilizes AI for smart DeFi investment opportunities on over 110 blockchains. Our goal is to simplify cross-chain investments while maintaining full user control over assets, all powered by NEAR\\\\\\'s chain abstraction and intelligent AI-based yield matching.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs**  \\\\n- **Departure:** Rome, Italy \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand  \\\\n- **Return:** Bangkok, Thailand \\\\u{2192} Rome, Italy  \\\\n\\\\n**Estimated Costs Breakdown:**  \\\\n- **Flights:** $750 USD  \\\\n\\\\n**Why Support My Participation**  \\\\n- Proven track record of delivering impactful blockchain solutions within the NEAR ecosystem, including winning the Nearcon 23 pitching competition.  \\\\n- Extensive experience in hackathons, consistently delivering innovative projects.  \\\\n- Committed to driving forward DeFi solutions that enhance user accessibility and yield optimization through AI-powered tools.  \\\\n\\\\n**Links**  \\\\n- DeFi Builder: [https://app.defibuilder.com/](https://app.defibuilder.com/)  \\\\n- DeFi Builder AI: [https://ai.defibuilder.com/](https://ai.defibuilder.com/)  \\\\n- Near Yield: [https://devpost.com/software/near-yield](https://devpost.com/software/near-yield)  \\\\n\\\\nThank you for considering my request for travel reimbursement to attend the [REDACTED] hackathon. Your support will enable me to further contribute to the NEAR ecosystem and showcase innovative solutions on a global stage.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "894a4d5af3a3b35498a998dc681eeea528437d893d6feff7bddd8d33a062c77c", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "750", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Travel expenses", "Hackathon"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131330568}

{"body": {"name": "Summary of Work Activities: NEAR DevHub Hackathon Lead (Sep 30 - Oct 28, 2024)", "summary": "A summary of all completed work activities between the specified date range, and all planned work for the next pay period.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "59c80a51c56ae779334116531c4624b220511267b6c81bf73d6c820a8627a21f", "description": "Summary of Work Activities: NEAR DevHub Hackathon Lead (Sep 30-Oct 28, 2024)\\\\n\\\\n- Attended regular calls with NEAR DevHub Core Moderators team and decentralized DevRel team\\\\n- Attended calls with ecosystem contributors representing NEAR Foundation, Aurora, Calimero, Proximity etc.\\\\n- Oversaw getting REDACTED hackathon to 1500+ participants: https://redacted.devpost.com/. \\\\nHighlighted activities: Capture the Flag challenge development; travel stipend application review coordination; community Q&A and follow up with the hackers\\\\n- Coordinated the Events Committee proposal flow\\\\n- Reviewed and evaluated the incoming proposals for the Events Committee\\\\n- Planned and executed NEAR presence at ETHGlobal San Francisco (October 18-20, 2024)\\\\n- Planned NEAR DevHub presence at REDACTED and ETHGlobal Bangkok (November 9-17, 2024)\\\\n\\\\nTimeline\\\\nStart: September 30, 2024\\\\nEnd date: October 28, 2024\\\\nTotal hours per week: 40\\\\nTotal hours: 120\\\\nHourly rate: $50/hr\\\\nTotal: $8000", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "devhub-payouts.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Hackbox", "Other"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131385361}
